What you can do with SyncMate
 

Synchronize Mac with multiple devices

 

No need to purchase several sync solutions — just download SyncMate and sync all supported devices within one application.

 

Synchronize Mac with cloud accounts

 

Sync data with online accounts and cloud storages! Outlook account and Office 365, iCloud storage, Google account, or even with your Dropbox account!

Synchronize Mac with cloud accounts

 

Sync data with online accounts and cloud storages! Outlook account and Office 365, iCloud storage, Google account, or even with your Dropbox account!

 

Numerous sync options

 

SyncMate lets you sync your Calendars, Reminders, Contacts, Safari bookmarks, Music, Photos. SyncMate lets you read and manage your SMS messages as well as text your friends and browse Call History directly from your Mac.
